trans-unit.source: Removes the in-memory database specified within the database connection URL. Generates the SQLException 08006 if successful. If the database does not exist, generates an error reporting that the database could not be found.

seg-source.mrk: Removes the in-memory database specified within the database connection URL.
If the database does not exist, generates an error reporting that the database could not be found.

target.mrk: Removes the in-memory database specified within the database connection URL.
If the database does not exist, generates an error reporting that the database could not be found.

trans-unit.source: For a database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can drop that database.

seg-source.mrk: For a database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can drop that database.

target.mrk: For a database for which authentication and SQL authorization are both enabled, only the <xref href="rrefattrib26867.dita#rrefattrib26867">database owner</xref> can drop that database.

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to shut down the database before dropping it.

seg-source.mrk: It is not necessary to shut down the database before dropping it.

target.mrk: It is not necessary to shut down the database before dropping it.

trans-unit.source: If you specify this attribute with a database that is not an in-memory database, generates the SQLException XBM0I.

seg-source.mrk: If you specify this attribute with a database that is not an in-memory database, generates the SQLException XBM0I.

target.mrk: If you specify this attribute with a database that is not an in-memory database, generates the SQLException XBM0I.

trans-unit.source: If authentication is turned on, you must specify this attribute in conjunction with the user=userName and password=userPassword attributes. If both authentication and SQL authorization are turned on, the user must be the database owner.

seg-source.mrk: If authentication is turned on, you must specify this attribute in conjunction with the user=userName and password=userPassword attributes.
If both authentication and SQL authorization are turned on, the user must be the database owner.

target.mrk: If authentication is turned on, you must specify this attribute in conjunction with the user=userName and password=userPassword attributes.
If both authentication and SQL authorization are turned on, the user must be the database owner.

trans-unit.source: -- drop an in-memory database using the embedded driver jdbc:derby:memory:myInMemDB;drop=true -- drop an in-memory database using the Network Server jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/memory:myInMemDB;drop=true

seg-source.mrk: -- drop an in-memory database using the embedded driver jdbc:derby:memory:myInMemDB;drop=true -- drop an in-memory database using the Network Server jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/memory:myInMemDB;drop=true

target.mrk: -- drop an in-memory database using the embedded driver jdbc:derby:memory:myInMemDB;drop=true -- drop an in-memory database using the Network Server jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/memory:myInMemDB;drop=true
